subject: Football
School Shootings
Murders and Attempted Murders
lead_paragraph: Coach Pete Carroll said it was an “amazing experience” for the Seahawks to host the football team from Marysville-Pilchuck High less than a week after a shooting at the school.
snippet: Coach Pete Carroll said it was an “amazing experience” for the Seahawks to host the football team from Marysville-Pilchuck High less than a week after a shooting at the school.
